name: Drone
description: Summon a drone for **15** seconds, increase final damage reduction by **5%** every **5** seconds. Cooldown: **120** seconds.

advancement.star1: Grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.
advancement.star3: Every **5** seconds, additionally grant Wanderers one stack of inspiration, increasing damage dealt by **5%** per stack.
advancement.star4: Reduce volt damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
advancement.star5: Within Drone's duration, Wanderers gain an attack recovery effect that converts **20%** of damage dealt into HP.
